<font color="#c0c0c0"><font color="#c0c0c0"><font color="#008080">The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth.<font color="#c0c0c0"><font color="#008080"> A large </font></font></font></font></font>

<font color="#008080">steady gaze.<font color="#c0c0c0"><font color="#008080"> A black, murky mist has settled here.<font color="#c0c0c0"><font color="#ffffff"><font color="#00ffff"> Lord Icaru Vastel is here, </font></font></font></font></font></font>
